headline: Jim Cramer Calls Nvidia's After-Hours Dip Is A 'Mistake,' Analyst Says Investors Now Expect Outsized Results Each Quarter
summary: On Wednesday, Nvidia Corp (NASDAQ:NVDA) delivered blockbuster quarterly results and raised its outlook, but the stock's muted after-hours reaction sparked debate on Wall Street about expectations and long-term growth. Record Results, Strong Outlook CNBC's Jim Cramer took to X and said the after-hours decline in shares of Nvidia was unwarranted, calling the pullback "a mistake" following a quarter that exceeded already high expectations.
